title: Set elytra fly acceleration to zero when going into an unloaded chunk with "No Unloaded Chunks" enabled

body:
## Type of change

- [x] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature

## Description

When "No Unloaded Chunks" is enabled, the velocity of the player is set to zero when entering an unloaded chunk, but the player doesn't re-accelerate when resuming travel, defeating the point of the "acceleration" option and often causing rubber banding. This PR forces re-acceleration and fixes the rubber banding. This could potentially be a separate setting.

## Related issues

None.
